Description: Klaviyo makes it easy for ecommerce marketers to target, personalize, measure and optimize email and Facebook campaigns.
Name: Klaviyo

Methods.Name: Subscribe To List
Methods.Description: Subscribe or re-subscribe profiles to a list. Profiles will be single or double opted into the specified list in accordance with that list’s settings.

Methods.Name: Get List or Segment Members
Methods.Description: Gets all of the emails, phone numbers, and push tokens for profiles in a given list or segment.

Methods.Name: Get List
Methods.Description: Gets a single List by ID

Methods.Name: Get List's Exclusions
Methods.Description: Gets all of the emails and phone numbers that have been excluded from a list along with the exclusion reasons and exclusion time.

Methods.Name: Get Lists
Methods.Description: Gets all the Lists in the account

Methods.Name: Get Global Exclusions and Unsubscribes
Methods.Description: Returns global exclusions/unsubscribes. Global exclusions are distinct from list exclusions in that these email addresses will not receive any emails from any list.
